data.name: Vectorio - Frosted Defenses Pack
data.detailed_description:
Celebrate the Holidays with the new Frosted Defenses pack!
The pack includes the following cosmetics from The Armory...

- Frosted Turret skin
- Frosted Shotgunner skin
- Frosted Ranger skin
- Frosted Pulser skin
- Frosted Minigun skin
- Frosted death effect
- Frosted bullet effect

These cosmetics can be applied from the Armory as well as changed in-game, and will work in both singleplayer modes and multiplayer modes. These are cosmetic changes only, and will not affect how the listed turrets function.

data.short_description: Celebrate the Holidays with the new Frosted Defenses pack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may differ slightly in future updates

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 650
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may differ slightly in future updates

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS or equivalent
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may differ slightly in future updates
